meanings.definition: The quality or state of being incorruptible.
meanings.sent1: Her incorruptibilities shone brightly in a world full of deceit.
meanings.sent2: The incorruptibilities of the ancient artifact amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: The incorruptibilities of the superhero made even the villains admire him.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a fortress of incorruptibilities, untouched by greed or malice.
meanings.sent5: The knight's armor symbolized his incorruptibilities in the face of temptation.
